actors: K.J. Apa, Britt Robertson, Nathan Parsons, Gary Sinise, Shania Twain, Reuben Dodd, Nicolas Bechtel, Melissa Roxburgh, Terry Serpico, Tanya Christiansen, Cameron Arnett, Abigail Cowen, Rushi Birudala, Anjelah Johnson-Reyes, Mike McGill
description: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.
